title: Blameless
description: What if you could go through life without being hurt by anyone? What if every time someone went to hurt you, they got hurt instead? Would you want that? That's the story of David Baker whose special gift allows him to go through life unharmed, so long as he remained blameless. When his secret is discovered he is used by the military for an interdimensional plot that spirals out of control.
author: Jim Warner
